description: Try a new take on the classic Sunday roast with this garlic and sage roast chicken recipe. Complete the dish with vegetables like potatoes or broccolini.
name: Garlic & Sage Roast Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pat chicken dry with paper towel. Tie legs together with kitchen string, season, then place on top of potato and bake, adding sage and butter to pan in last 10 minutes of cooking, for 1 hour or until chicken juices run clear when thickest part of thigh is pierced with a skewer. Serve with broccolini.

Serve with broccolini.
